1.title: Getting the Point Across
1.plot: Ten-year-old Lilac rescues the kidnapped Amy, consults with Irinka the Soothsayer, is confronted by "The Bishop," and must deal with a stranger who approaches her in a dark alley. Just another normal day.

imdb.plot outline: This series follows the adventures of its title character as she tries to fix a world she believes is horribly broken. Variously described as "Orphan Annie meets Annie Oakley" and "Grimms' Tales for the modern era," Lilac embraces the notion that it's not always necessary to annihilate one's enemy to win the war. Possessed with nearly supernatural marksmanship, crossbow-wielding Lilac could certainly inflict pain and death upon her adversaries, but chooses to use intimidation and cleverness instead. Aimed at a family audience, this dark & edgy series nevertheless addresses serious issues such as child trafficking, bullying, smoking, and violence.
imdb.title: Lilac
plot: What if Robin Hood was a homeless ten-year-old girl living in a modern city...

This series follows the adventures of its title character as she tries to fix a world she believes is horribly broken. Variously described as "Orphan Annie meets Annie Oakley" and "Grimms' Tales for the modern era," _Lilac_ (qv) embraces the notion that it's not always necessary to annihilate one's enemy to win the war. Possessed with nearly supernatural marksmanship, crossbow-wielding _Lilac_ (qv) could certainly inflict pain and death upon her adversaries, but chooses to use intimidation and cleverness instead. Aimed at a family audience, this dark & edgy series nevertheless addresses serious issues such as child trafficking, bullying, smoking, and violence.::H. Isaac
